description: [``botocore``] Fixes issue that could cause calls to GetAdminScope and ListAdminAccountsForOrganization to return a 500 Internal Server error.

[``botocore``] Added ModelNameEquals, ModelPackageVersionArnEquals in request and ModelName, SamplePayloadUrl, ModelPackageVersionArn in response of ListInferenceRecommendationsJobs API. Added Invocation timestamps in response of DescribeInferenceRecommendationsJob API & ListInferenceRecommendationsJobSteps API.
[``botocore``] Added support for calling TranslateDocument API.
